PHRASE.LANG: kName
Polar Rush Tundra Lodge
Chalet de la toundra Polar Rush
Polar-Rush-Winterhütte
Chalet nella tundra Polar Rush
Refugio de la tundra Polar Rush
Polar Rush Tundra Lodge
Polar Rush Tundra Lodge
Polar Rush Tundra Lodge
Polar Rush Tundra Lodge
Polar Rush Tundra Lodge
Polar Rush Tundra Lodge
kDesc

Jump on your snowmobile and explore the tundra in this exciting new personal space from Lockwood! From your modern apartment, you'll be able to look out onto the beautiful arctic surroundings before riding out to see what you can find. Includes Snowmobile Exploration minigame which allows you to cruise around the landscape, perform stunts and find 9 exclusive PlayStation®Home rewards. [#Legal]

Enfourchez votre motoneige et explorez la toundra dans cet incroyable espace personnel de Lockwood. Vous pourrez voir le magnifique environnement arctique qui vous entoure à partir du confort de votre appartement moderne avant de sortir explorer les environs. Inclut un mini-jeu d'exploration en motoneige qui vous permet de parcourir le paysage, d'effectuer des acrobaties et de trouver 9 récompenses PlayStation®Home exclusives. [#Legal]

Spring auf dein Schneemobil und erkunde die Winterlandschaft mit diesem neuen, aufregenden persönlichen Bereich von Lockwood! Aus deinem modernen Appartement heraus kannst du dir deine wunderschöne arktische Umgebung ansehen, bevor du auf Erkundgunstour gehst. Enthält das Minispiel „Schneemobil-Erkundung“, in dem du durch die Landschaft fahren, Stunts machen und 9 exklusive PlayStation®Home-Belohnungen finden kannst. [#Legal]

Salta sul tuo gatto delle nevi ed esplora la tundra, questo nuovo emozionante spazio personale di Lockwood. Dal tuo nuovo appartamento moderno potrai ammirare il fantastico panorama artico prima di uscire e scoprire ciò che c'è da trovare. È incluso il minigioco Esplora con il gatto delle nevi, che ti permette di vagare lungo il paesaggio, eseguire acrobazie e trovare 9 esclusive ricompense PlayStation®Home. [#Legal]

¡Súbete a tu motonieve y explora la tundra en este nuevo y emocionante espacio personal de Lockwood! Desde tu moderno apartamento podrás disfrutar del maravilloso paisaje ártico antes de salir a dar una vuelta para ver qué encuentras. Incluye el minijuego en exclusiva Exploración en motonieve que te permite recorrer el paisaje, hacer acrobacias y encontrar nueve recompensas exclusivas de PlayStation®Home. [#Legal]

Jump on your snowmobile and explore the tundra in this exciting new personal space from Lockwood! From your modern apartment, you'll be able to look out onto the beautiful arctic surroundings before riding out to see what you can find. Includes Snowmobile Exploration minigame which allows you to cruise around the landscape, perform stunts and find 9 exclusive PlayStation®Home rewards. [#Legal]
